Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini okukhanyayo ebusuku
Awukho umphefumulo kepha phezu kwawo kunomlondolozi
Ngakho-ke akabheke umuntu ukuthi wadalwa ngani
Ngifunga ngakho-ke angeke abenawo amandla nomsizi
Futhi ngifunga ngezulu (ngesibhakabhaka) esiletha imvula ngokuphindelela
Futhi ngifunga ngomhlaba ngenkathi uqhekeka phakathi
Ngakho-ke	banike	ithuba	abangakholwa,	bayekwe okwesikhashana ngobumnene
